episodes.content:
[BIZ STREAM SPECIAL EDITION]
This series of special editions feature selected stories from BIZ STREAM's signature "On-Site" reports. This episode examines how advances in the recycling of bio-waste are playing a key role in creating a more circular society. We feature a Japanese company that has found a way to extract hydroxyapatite (a key ingredient in making toothpaste and cosmetics) from eggshells, and another company that is turning sugar cane and other waste products into biofuel.
episodes.description: From minerals found in eggshells to cotton extracted from second-hand clothing, this special edition shows how advances in recycling technology will help lead to a more circular society.
episodes.subtitle: Getting More from Biowaste
episodes.title: BIZ STREAM
